name: agent_generated_websim_mcp_server
description: Production-ready MCP server for accessing WebSim API data including project information, user profiles, trending content, and community features. Provides comprehensive access to WebSim's ecosystem with support for project discovery, user analytics, asset search, and community engagement tracking.
description_for_agent: Complete WebSim integration server offering project management tools (get project by ID/slug, list trending projects), user management (get user profile, projects, statistics), search functionality (projects, assets, related keywords), and community features (project comments, screenshots). Built with TypeScript and optimized for Smithery deployment.

WEBSIM_USER_AGENT.description: Custom User-Agent string for API requests (default: websim-mcp-server/1.0.0)

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a WebSim project by its ID. Perfect for 'Show me project [ID]' questions.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project

tools.name: get_project_by_slug
tools.description: Get project information using owner's username and project slug. Perfect for '@username/project-slug' queries.

user.description: The username of the project owner

tools.name: list_trending_projects
tools.description: Get trending WebSim projects with filtering options. Perfect for 'Show me trending projects' queries.

limit.description: Number of projects to return (1-100, default: 20)

range.description: Time range for trending (hour, day, week, month, all)

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get detailed user profile information. Perfect for 'Tell me about user [username]' queries.

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

tools.name: get_user_projects
tools.description: List projects created by a specific user with sorting options. Perfect for 'Show me @username's projects' queries.

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

sort_by.description: Sort field (created, updated, views, likes, title)

tools.name: get_user_stats
tools.description: Get detailed statistics for a WebSim user. Perfect for 'Show me @username's statistics' queries.

username.description: The username of the WebSim user

tools.name: search_projects
tools.description: Search for WebSim projects by keywords, tags, or descriptions. Perfect for 'Find projects about [topic]' queries.

sort.description: Sort results by (relevance, date, views, likes, trending)

tools.name: search_assets
tools.description: Search for assets (images, files, resources) in WebSim projects. Perfect for 'Find assets about [topic]' queries.

tools.name: get_related_keywords
tools.description: Get related keywords and search suggestions based on a query. Perfect for 'What keywords are related to [topic]?' queries.

query.description: The search query to get related keywords for

tools.name: list_project_comments
tools.description: Get comments on a WebSim project. Perfect for 'Show me comments on project [ID]' queries.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project

first.description: Number of first comments to return

last.description: Number of last comments to return

tools.name: list_project_screenshots
tools.description: Get screenshots of a WebSim project revision. Perfect for 'Show me screenshots of project [ID]' queries.

id.description: The unique identifier of the WebSim project
